name: Ronnie Abrams
text: Pizza Hut it's one of the best pictures in pounds ether several times

name: Connie Hart
text: I placed a carry out order,  two 3 topping pizzas for 7.99. Got home one of them was thin crust which I did not order. They both taste like they had been in the warmer for hour. Dry and hard, just awful. I called them told them that one was …More

name: Jessica Childers
text: Fast & Friendly service!

name: Tesa Craig
text: Food was hot and delivered ahead of quoted time.

name: Arthenia Douglas
text: Newly renovated and the atmosphere is just beautiful along with the Customer Service here is great,  the Buffet is always great and so are the Price's. Great place to take the Family.

name: Les Jones
text: Busy alot of people not enough help. It is usually pretty good. The food was good just not very good service.

name: Donna Leek
text: Great place to go in and relax. Great food always!

name: Ethan Stevens
text: the cheese was not on top of my pizza, it was on the top of the box instead.

name: Harry Talady
text: The Pizza Hut in Harrisburg was very good everybody was friendly the food was good thank you very much I appreciate it and I was a limo driver from Frankfort Kentucky Legacy limousine

name: E.T. Linda Priddy
text: Lunch Buffet, Friday  February 1st, was very tasty and bountiful. Our server Sam was very considerate and timely. Should seek out a Danville location.

name: Mark Alcorn Jr
text: Good food,  good service

name: Bonnie Rutherford
text: Food was hot and good.  Service was fast and friendly. We will definitely recommend this restaurant and plan on returning.

name: Steven Williams
text: I walked in and made a carryout order and it was completely wrong. I had to repeat myself 3 times and still got it wrong. I WILL NOT be going back to that PizzaHut ever again!!!

name: Big Daddies 57 Chevy Bel-Air
text: Called ahead for my order got there a few min. Early still was waiting which was ok but when I was getting ready to eat my pizza it was cold just after 5 min.

name: Sam Fraley
text: My favorite place to get wings great food great service

name: Charlotte Davis
text: Great, clean family restaurant... Staff are friendly and food is always fresh and hot!!!!

name: Lewis Walter
text: A bargain for the price. Very attentive waitresses. All in all a good experience. I recommend this Pizza Hut as a geat place to have a set-down meal.

name: tojo yamamoto
text: Great service and great food!

name: Chastity McLemore
text: Just left, Pizza was great. Great service and seen a child doing something wrong and the employees addressed it with speed. Thank you to all who worked today. God bless

name: Angela Britt
text: Great service great food never disappointed

name: DJ Cadwell
text: Good food, friendly and timely service

name: Jamal DiBiase
text: Everyone was super friendly and the food was absolutely Phenomenal I'll be back and I really liked the 5 dollar picks had enough food to feed an army and saved lots of Money Ted DiBiase always said Everybody's Got a Price $$$$

name: Jeffrey Hughes
text: Great food, price and service.

name: Angela Schenk
text: Just like any other Pizza Hut. Waitress was nice. Salad bar was kind of plain but it was also super cheap to add to a meal! Breadsticks are always awesome.

name: Kristi Cutsinger
text: Like the taste

name: Tim Biggs
text: good food friendly service

name: Jeff Baker
text: Grate  late evening buff relly good Easley access to the store

name: Donna R
text: We waited an hour for our dine in pizza. The excuse they offered was they were busy and had a large order.  Since when are the eat in diners less important than deliveries??? But there were only 3 tables occupied, including us.

name: Bonnie Keeton
text: Good food, reasonable pricing, quality service

name: Tim Cummings
text: Nice staff and good food

name: Emma Douglas
text: Probably the freshest pizza lunch buffet I've ever been to. Nothing looked like it had been under the heat lamps too long. Salad bar had plenty of options. Staff was friendly and prompt.

name: Terry Sears
text: Good food and service

name: Shirleen Gullett
text: I ordered the Pan Supreme like I always do. The pizza was still hot when I got it home and delicious! Excellent service!

name: Jalessa McPherson
text: A1 Customer service. Feels like family!

name: Lisa Lanham
text: Liked salad bar, several pizza choices, good service.

name: Tim Berger
text: Longest running Pizza place in town.  The pizza is always good...

name: jered colter
text: Service bad food sucks just a bad place all around

text: Buffet did not seem sanitary.   Salad fixings were not real fresh.

name: Linda Clark
text: Food was really good

name: David Devine
text: Service very friendly.  Prices normal, restaurant was clean, salad bar looked fresh

name: twp35
text: Most of the time we don't have a problem and we like the pizza. Some days they just screw up,like tonight. Driver delivered the pizza but forgot the 4 extra garlic cups. We should have had 5 since the pizza comes with one already. I told …More

name: Ken Kalmey
text: We had not been to Pizza Hut for years.  What a surprise!  The crust was very flavorful and toppings delicious.  We were in Harrodsburg, Kentucky.

name: Richard Seedle
text: This store has a very friendly staff and do a great job

name: Laura Thomas
text: Pizza hut seems to have changed their crust recipe. More sugar in it. It was ok but probably won't visit again. Our server was Premo. No complaints in that area.

name: Caleb Poole
text: It has recently been updated in the last couple years. It's alot nicer than it has been in the past. Food is pretty good, just make sure your order is correct before you leave.

name: Miranda Russell
text: Food is great but the employees are not so great. Dine at your own risk.

name: Doug Padgett
text: Good food. Server could have been a bit more helpful since I told her we'd not been there before.

name: Lisa
text: Good pizza, good price
